system.description:
You have picked up a number of tricks in your path towards perfection. At 2nd level you gain a practiced technique of your choice. Your practiced techniques are listed below. The Techniques Known column of the Adept table shows when you learn more practiced techniques. Unless otherwise noted, you can gain each technique only once.

Adept Speed

Focus Speech

Gale Walk

Hurricane Walk

Instant Step

Marathon Runner

Nimble Athlete

Power Tumble

Religious Training

Shadow Walk

Sixth Sense

Slow Fall

Wall Walk

Warriorâ€™s Awareness

Water Walk

Wilderness Training
